mapper.sql: wf_awt_id AS wfAwtId, INST_ID AS instId, TASK_ID_CURR AS taskIdCurr, HIST_ID_PRE AS histIdPre, ASSIGNER_ID AS assignerId, awt_begin AS awtBegin, awt_end AS awtEnd, awt_alarm AS awtAlarm, awt_title AS awtTitle, awt_summary AS awtSummary, complete_flag as completeFlag, CREATED_BY AS createdBy, CREATED_DT AS createdDt, UPDATED_BY AS updatedBy, UPDATED_DT AS updatedDt
mapper.select: select awt.*, hist_prev.opt_user, inst.created_by as inst_creater, case when awt.HIST_ID_PRE is null then awt.ASSIGNER_ID else hist_prev.NEXT_ASSIGNER end as task_owner, task.task_descp_disp, inst.rs_wf_id, inst.inst_num, inst.ref_mkid from wf_awt awt left join wf_inst_hist hist_prev on hist_prev.HIST_ID = awt.HIST_ID_PRE join wf_task task on task.TASK_ID = awt.TASK_ID_CURR join wf_instance inst on inst.INST_ID=awt.INST_ID where awt.ASSIGNER_ID=#{userId} and (awt.complete_flag is null or awt.complete_flag!='Y')
